SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: Wha—!? *cough* *sputter*

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Gar har har! Ye all right there, cully?
Hoist anchor, lads! We got a wee
minnow what needs savin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Yar, but they be catchin' up while we
was savin' the minnow... Think, Ivar!
Think! It's time to be comin' up with
a whale of an idea!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Awake at last, minnow? Gar, what were ye
doin' out there in the briny blue? Did ye run
aground in a storm? And who be ye, anyway?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
*cough* My sincerest apologies—and how refined
of you to throw a guest straight into the sea.
I am Siugnas, the Dismal King, and I have come
here in search of fearsome darkness.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
The Damsel Kid's lookin' for darkness?
Aye, but we reeled in a strange one
today, lads!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
I be Ivar, captain of the Sea Turtle.
Finest ship on the blue, so she be!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: MerchantShipSailor
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: Baltasar's firing at us, Captain!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Keep yer damn breeches on, lad!
He can't be reachin' us from there.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
So Baltasar be gettin' himself a new
cannon, eh? Well, the ocean can take
his bones, says me! All hands, ready for close-quarter combat!
Hoist the mainsail! All arms at the ready, lads!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: Does this ship pursue you?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Yar, it does that fair and true!
Baltasar the pirate is comin'
after the goods we carry!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Bwaaa ha ha ha! I gotcha, Ivar!
Now hand over the egg and maybe
I'll let yer pathetic crew live.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Gar, I don't trust ye far as I can throw ye!
If I be handin' me crew over to ye,
they'll dance at the end of a rope
before the day be out!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Aw, c'mon! I raised ya, remember?
Even a pirate king has a soft spot
for his own boy.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
I suppose whether or not
you trust him is up to you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Gar, ye always were a bilge-suckin' rat!
Fine then. Take the damn egg—and may
ye never have a day's luck with it!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Ya chose well, boy. Stand down, men!
I promised to spare their lives,
so that's what I'm gonna do... AFTER we set their ship on fire!
Bwaaaaaa ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Why, ye blasted sea snake!
How am I supposed to be makin'
a livin' without me ship!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: Figure it out.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Once you know a fall awaits, you can ready
yourself for ordinary water. And yet, I see
this sea holds a world of abyssal darkness.
I find it...comforting.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Aye, you be a strange one, minnow.
Now swim for land! Stroke! Stroke!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Me precious Sea Turtle be burnin' up...
She be in so much pain... *sniff* Damn that Baltasar! Next time I see him,
I'll pull his guts and wear 'em for garters!
I'll gouge out his eye and cram it right
up his own— Oh. Yer awake, minnow.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
I sensed an unusual power coming from
the egg you handed over to that fiend.
Explain its significance.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Do ye really not know Deus Maris's egg,
minnow? Gar, but ye really are from
across the briny blue...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Well then, here be a tale, fair and true!
These waters have a god of the sea that
hatches from a mighty egg. Takes years, so it do—sometimes decades—
but when Deus Maris finally be hatched,
he ascends to heaven in a mighty cyclone.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
But before he goes, Deus Maris be grantin'
a wish to whoever hatched the egg. Gives ye
anything, so he does. Riches, fame, strength—
ye have but to name it, and it be yours.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
And did this wondrous
egg belong to you?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Nay, 'twasn't mine. I only be hired to transport it,
but somehow Baltasar caught wind and wise.
I hear he'll ask Deus Maris to turn him back to a
man, though I think he's better suited as a fiend.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
The egg be what turned him fiend
in the first place. Yar, me father and Baltasar used to be true
mates on the sea, but when the most recent
egg hatched, me father died, and Baltasar
turned into the monster ye be seein' earlier.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
With me father a dead man, Baltasar raised me
as his own. I was but a wee minnow when it
happened, so I don't be rememberin' me real
father, nor Baltasar's true face.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
But here's what I can't wrap me head around:
what kinda wish coulda killed one of 'em and
turned the other into a fiend? Yar, maybe it's
best to leave such wishes be...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Power comes at a price—and the greater
the wish, the weightier the cost.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Gahar har har! Ye be a funny one, Damsel Kid!
And yet, yer words give me a sense'a peace
I've not felt in a whale's year. Aye, a man's gotta think long and hard if he
be makin' a wish of Deus Maris, and such a
thing's likely to blow back on ye more than not.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Mmm. Yes, well, what is your plan now?
I do hope you don't intend to sit here
and watch that ship burn for all eternity?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
First, we be getting off this island!
Plenty'a wreckage washes up here, so it do,
and we'll use it to build a raft and sail to
freedom! That is, assumin' ye wanna help?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
This world has piqued my interest.
So yes. I will help.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Then from this moment on, minnow, ye be
a proud member of Cap'n Ivar's crew! But seein' as yer the lowest-rankin' sailor
here, ye gotta be doin' everything I say.
Now get to work, ye blasted lazybones!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
A wish-granting egg? Curious. I've no need
for such a trinket, but I imagine humans
would think it fascinating. Perhaps I'll 
find what I seek as I travel with this man.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Gar, minnow! Quit starin' into space like
a beached whale and get to buildin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Ye put that together fine, minnow!
Gar, ye take deep talk with ease,
ye got a mighty weird name—who be ye,
and why be ye in this blasted ocean?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
I am the Dismal King, and I have come
here in search of fascinating beings
worthy of serving under me.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Well, there be all sorts'a pirates and fiends
out in the briny blue, so I'm sure one or two
will catch yer eye. But if ye like, I can help
ye search for yer prize.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: I will be counting on you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Gahar har har! It always be smooth sailin'
with Captain Ivar at yer side!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
But it also be the newbie's job to row,
so get to rowin', minnow!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: You ask me to row?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
I can't believe I'm back in the Mare Nostrum!
This means the wish I made on Deus Maris's
egg was all for nothing!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Gar, I thought raft-buildin' might be
too much for those scrawny arms, minnow. Ho, lads! Get this raft assembled before
I be assemblin' my boot up yer behinds!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: MerchantShipSailor
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: Aye, Captain! Right away!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
By the way, minnow, ye take deep talk
with ease, ye got a mighty weird name—
who be ye, and why be ye in this ocean?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text:
I come bearin' ill news, boss: that scabrous
knave Baltasar stormed the Sea Turtle,
seized the goods, and set her to burn.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text:
Blast it all! That fiend knows I built the
Sea Turtle with my own two hands, and
he went ahead and burned her anyway! And since he's not the type to come around
offering up reparations for his misdeeds,
I guess I'm out of pocket on this one.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text:
I take it you'll need a new boat, Ivar?
Hard to make a living without one.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text: Yar, but I be havin' no coin.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text: Why are all my customers broke? Well, turns out we've got bigger problems than your empty purse: my architect went chasing after some skirt again, and now he's gone missing.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text:
By grog, does that blasted simpleton fall
in love with every lass he sees!? Fine then. I'll be findin' yer architect;
I'll clap him in irons and drag him home
in a sack if I have to. But once I do, cully,
ye'll build me a new ship for free.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text: I never work for free, Captain, but how about we say I'll give it to you at a very steep discount. No deposit required.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text: I'll be holdin' ye to that, cully!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text:
Something about that ship
seems rather amiss.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_LOOK_AT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_LOOK_AT_.text:
Yer right, minnow—it keeps goin'
'round the same spot.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_LOOK_AT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_LOOK_AT_.text:
We're on a raft, ye daft mollusk!
If something happens, we be sunk again!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
Fiends be all over 'em! We gotta get in
there and help before their ship ends
up at the bottom of the briny blue!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text: The two of us are fine, but that fiend attack has simply ruined our honeymoon! Isn't that right, babygirl?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Hunny_Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
Yeaaah, but the fiends are, like,
totally gone now, so maybe we can
just enjoy ourselves or whatever?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
Gar, but it be the architect!
Back to the shipyard with ye!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
I think not, sir! I am currently on
a honeymoon with my babygirl!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
Get yer scurvy tush in gear before
I use yer teeth for confetti!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
Good heavens, this raft is the most
rickety thing I've ever...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
Hmmm... But wait... Yes... Yes!
Just feel the balance! The flow!
The sophisticated triangular design! O, glorious envy! Your fires rage within me!
The desire to build ships burns in my breast!
Quickly, man! Now! To the shipyard!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text: Is that man always like this?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text: Aye, but good at his job.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
Is there a reason why so many
wrecked ships wash up here?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
There's the tides, yar, but that's not all—
there be killer whales here that attack ships
and devour both passengers and crew.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
And by chum, do they ever look tasty!
Can't say how long I've been wantin'
to bite into one of 'em! Gahar har har!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
Are fiends a common delicacy
in this land?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
Aye, but I'm the only one who eats 'em.
Whatever be floatin' yer boat, says I.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
Heavens, it's Captain Ivar!
Oh, now this IS a relief!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
Washed up ashore alone, I see.
Shame the comely lass abandoned ye.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
Uh... No! No, it's not like that at ALL, sir!
You see, our ship was attacked by marauders,
but just before it sank, my babygirl grabbed
me and threw me overboard, saving my life!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
Oh, my darling! My precious! My love!
I live only because of you, babygirl!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.text:
Gar, there be somethin' tasty
swimmin' beneath 'em!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.text: Was that a cry of a fiend?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.text:
Gahaaar har har! That be me stomach,
minnow! She rumbles like an old cannon
whenever I see a tasty-lookin' fiend.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.text:
I fail to understand why one
would willingly consume fiends.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
There you are! I'm not even going to ask
where you were or why—just get in there
and design Ivar a ship.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Right then! I've already got the basic framework
in mind, so I'll just add a few personal touches
based on Captain Ivar's preferences and...
Yes, take this... Move this here...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Look at this man work—what skill he has!
Why, he has assembled an entire ship
before our very eyes!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
And now for the finishing touch!
Captain Ivar? If you would be so kind?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Best let this man do it, Captain.
I sense a strange power from him—
he'll make you a right good ship.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Yar, go on, minnow. Add the final stroke.
They say it be good luck, so they do!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text: Well, good luck out there, Ivar. And for the love of Deus Maris, try to keep this one afloat.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
At last, we be settin' sail on a REAL ship!
But we gotta eat first, for nothin' gets
done on an empty stomach, says I! Gahar!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Surrenderin' already, minnow?
Fine, just give it here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
We be ready to sail now, by gar!
But before we hoist anchor, I need grub!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
It's yer lucky day, minnow—I'm gonna
fix ye me world-famous Pirate Surprise!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
While I do not require human sustenance,
I will not say no to a unique meal.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
And here it be! One Pirate Surprise!
Go on now, minnow! Eat hearty!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
It smells fine—and looks good as well.
What manner of meat is this?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Fiend meat, minnow! Yar, it be quite
low in fat and surprisingly healthy!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Thought ye might be the type to appreciate
a bit'a fiend meat, but seems I was wrong. Gar, but it be the finest flavor in all the
seas, says I! 'Tis the only thing in the
world that can satisfy me insatiable hunger!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Aye, but that was the finest of meals...
Now hoist anchor, lads! We make for the
Southern Trade Port to take on cargo and
tell 'em the sad tale of the stolen egg!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Ivar! You're alive! When I heard the
Sea Turtle sank, I figured you went
down with the ship.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Yar, I managed to get out,
but Baltasar stole the egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
I KNEW using the egg to make a quick buck
was a stupid idea! That's just not the
kind of cargo a decent person deals with.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Gar, don't be givin' up now! Ye gave me
the down payment for the egg, and I'll
get it back, fair and true.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
In that case, I hear Baltasar can
be found at the blue hole. It's apparently VERY bright at the moment,
and his ship is just sailing in circles
around it for...some reason.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
If it be glowing, it means that feculent
maggot Baltasar is up to no good... Yar, then that's where we're headin'!
But first, I'll be needin' some cargo—
can't chase down a rat without
a bit'a gold linin' me pockets.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text: Just don't push yourself.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Do we have a plan for retrieving
the egg from these pirates?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Gahar har har! We'll be figurin' that
out once we get there, ye wee minnow!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Yar, that there be an endless pit where
Deus Maris is said to descend from the
heavens—and while I can't say what Baltasar
be schemin', I know the egg is involved.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Ye'll understand if ye ever hold the egg,
minnow, but a man just can't help talkin'
sweet to the thing.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Yar, but the egg be talkin' back—
right into yer noggin! Now that I'm thinkin' on it, the same thing
happened when I dragged ye outta the brine.
The egg told me to drop anchor, and I found
ye sputterin' in the waves not long after.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
That would be due to the magic contained
within it. You are drawn to it, and I also
believe Baltasar will have followed its
instruction to the blue hole.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Yar, perhaps—for the egg takes
no man's wishes for free.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Been a while since I heard talk about the
blue hole. Will we really have a chance to
take the egg back from that monster there?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Yar, what be the meanin' of this,
ye rotten cockroach!? Where be the egg?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
I should ask the same, ya blasted
fart-smeller! The egg went and
threw itself into the damn ocean!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Gahaaar har har har har!
Sounds like it hates ye!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Shut up, ya blasted boy! I'm gonna sink yer...
Oh, hell. I give up. I'll never be findin'
the egg in a sea this deep. So long.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
So long? SO LONG!? That's all ye got
to say after sinkin' a man's ship!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
The Blue Demon be out and about
in these parts, Ivar. Watch yerself.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
I'm surprised that devil bothered to warn us.
Is this ship truly so dangerous?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
Aye, that ship belong to Azure, sworn guardian
of Deus Maris. She be ruthless against any
pirate who seek the egg, and they all be
rightly terrified of her! Oh, but don't go worryin' about it,
minnow, 'cause we're not pirates. Gahar!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
But enough'a that tale! I swore I'd never
give up tryin' to find the egg, and now
it be at the bottom of the deep!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
We simply need call for it
and the egg will answer.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
Er...yar? That might actually work, minnow.
Go on, boys! Get to wishin'! Wish for the egg
to come outta hidin' with everythin' ye got!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
Yar, it be likin' me more than Baltasar...
Now raise those sails high, lads!
We make for the southern harbor.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
I doubt Deus Maris's guardian
will let us go quietly.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
You did say that Deus Maris rides
a cyclone back to Heaven, yes?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
Aye, which means me wish will be comin'
true if we get to the cyclone!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text: No! That's not the Pillar to Heaven!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text: But I might be able to steal the egg during the chaos of the cyclone! Oh, but then what do I say if Count sees me? I can't trick him! Damn it all, what am I supposed to do!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_STORM_SOUTH_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_STORM_SOUTH_0.text:
Will this ship be able to
withstand these winds?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_STORM_SOUTH_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_STORM_SOUTH_0.text: Gar, we can't even get close!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_STORM_SOUTH_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_STORM_SOUTH_0.text:
And we will not turn back so easily;
fiends have emerged from the cyclone.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.text:
Those gar-blasted fiends took the egg!
After them, me hearties!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.text:
Feel free, if you wish to
sink your ship again.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.text: Gar, I lost the egg again...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.text:
Think of it only as time away from the egg.
You will be able to pursue it later so long
as your ship remains intact.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.text:
Gahar har har! Yer startin' to sound like
a true man of the sea, minnow! Aye, but ye only be half-right: while we be
needin' a boat, what we really be needin'
is a BIGGER boat! Now let's sail to port
and get us some coin!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Glad to see you in one piece, Ivar. But I've got
bad news: the cyclone you tried to throw yourself
into wasn't the Pillar to Heaven—we would've been
able to see the Pillar from all the way out here. It's an understandable mistake, though,
considering you've never seen it before.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text: Gar, this be all me fault...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Look, anyone holding the egg would do the
same thing the moment they saw a cyclone.
And honestly, I think it's great that you care
enough about your wish to stake your life on it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text: Those blasted old men really put you through the wringer—treated you like a dirty thief whenever you wanted something, which turned you into a kid who didn't want anything.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Yar, belay that talk, harbormaster!
I be full-grown now, and I want me
cut of the goods same as any!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Aw! It's so sweet to see my cute
little Ivar all grown up and
bringing me beautiful men!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Are you ill, Captain?
Your ears are red.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Stow it, minnow! ...Now then, harbormaster,
have ye any work for us? We've not much time,
and I'm needin' to make a fine haul so I can
buy meself a larger ship.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Hmmm... Well, I've got a couple of ideas.
You can either get the scientist out at the
lighthouse to draw up a lease agreement, or you
can reclaim stolen goods from a pirate base. Both options are dangerous in their own ways,
so I'll leave the choice to you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Yar, I be not excited about the pirate base.
We can't even be gettin' there with our sloop,
so we'll need to go back to the shipyard
and switch over to a raft.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text: Now where shall we go?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Oh, I almost forgot. You saved a passenger
ship a while ago, right? Well, they wanted
me to pass something along in thanks.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text: Mmm. Then I will take it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Carolina
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text: Tra la la la la! Oh! Hello there, friend! I am Carolina, a wandering bard. Now take a seat—quietly—and listen to my rapturous song.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text:
Yar, it be Carolina! We're in luck,
minnow—'tis rare to cross her path.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Carolina
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text:
High atop the tower,
void of all its light.
The color that brings happiness
is of the sea so bright. Yet when this tale unfolds,
what evil should appear?
The very worst of all the beasts...
The one all pirates fear! HEY!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Carolina
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text:
Tra la la la lay!
Agents of chaos on water are they!
Their hiding place, hey!
Their hiding place, ho!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Carolina
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text:
AAAND...KEY CHANGE!
I say hey—HEY! And then ho—HO!
And a shaba-dabba-do
that I sing just for you! HEY!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Carolina
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text:
Alas, I can't claim to understand that one
very well, but I'll pray for your success.
And now, I must be off. WAH-HOOOOOO!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text:
I say hey—HEY! And then ho—HO!
Yar, damn me eyes! That song's gonna be
stuck in me head for the rest of the day.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text:
Agents of chaos on water...
Their hiding places...
Let us away to the pirate base.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Hello? Please, help me!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Another victim!? Yar, we be comin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Oh, thank you so much, my friends!
I may be a marine researcher, but I was
very close to being fish food!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Those violent pirates sunk my ship
and cast me adrift—I've been out
here for three days and nights!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Yar, 'tis a pity. But tell me, man,
did ye see a pirate named Baltasar?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Sadly, my hearty friend, I research
large sea creatures, not pirate monikers. But there's a more important issue: my research
notes have been washed away! Those notes are of
vital import to the scientific community at large,
so I implore you to look for them with all haste!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Have ye seen how vast the ocean be?
'Tis a fool's errand to even look.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Large sea creatures...
Does he mean Deus Maris?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
What a clever lad! Indeed, the creature
known as 'Deus Maris' in these parts
is believed by people of science to be
some manner of large sea creature!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: I would know of Deus Maris.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: You waste my time, researcher!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
If yer researchin' Deus Maris, cully,
ye might be good for somethin' after all.
We'll help ye find yer missin' notes.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Oh, thank you so much! Now then, I have two missing 
notebooks. They both have a water-resistant coating and
boast magnificent buoyancy, so you should be able to
find them floating on the water's surface.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
We simply need to collect them from
the water. It is a trifling thing.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Yar, don't be gettin' yer hopes up, minnow!
The sea be vast, and we've plenty of other
business to attend to besides.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Gar, ye egghead! We'll be droppin' ye off
at the next port; ye should be able to
book passage on another ship there.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Yes, of course—and thank you again.
You saved my life this day.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
My notes! Oh, but this is just wonderful!
They're undamaged, and the data is intact.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Yar, but 'tis passin' strange—
yer log be lookin' different from mine.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
So you came from another
ocean as well, researcher?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Yes, yes! Precisely so.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
TWO outsiders? Yar, is all the sketchy
folk showin' up lately a sign that
Deus Maris's ascension be near?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Those are my research notes! And those fiends are...sniffing them? Fascinating...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Will your work survive being chewed
and thrown about like that?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
I say, they're treating it like a toy!
Oh, but this is simply brillia— Wait, no!
This is TERRIBLE! Those fiends are going
to destroy my life's work!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Very well. Wait there.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
They're back! My beloved research notes!
I am now one step closer to unlocking
the mysteries of the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Good. Now tell me of Deus Maris.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Yes, well, while you did indeed help me and
I very much appreciate it, this data is far too
advanced for the layperson to even begin—

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Spill it before I pull out yer tongue
and toss ye over the side!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
EEEEEEP! Er, I mean, o-of course, sir!
You may consider class in session! The creature you call the Deus Maris shares traits
with so-called 'divine' beings from other worlds,
including transcendental power, the ability to
grant blessings, and a most majestic presence.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
In contrast to genuinely divine beings,
however, Deus Maris has a life cycle—
hence Deus Maris's egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Yar, just stop talkin', egghead.
I ain't followin' a thing ye say.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Yes, I rather feared that.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
If you cannot understand,
then remain silent.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Gar, fine! Ye sure do make some
terrifyin' faces, minnow.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Right. Now then, if Deus Maris's egg were to remain in this world, it would be a mere egg like any other. However, this creature has a life cycle that actually straddles the Conjoined Worlds using the egg form! It's remarkable!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Do you mean to say Deus Maris traverses
in and out of this world? If so, what is
the egg—and why would it deliberately
choose such an inconvenient form?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Deus Maris's egg is a vessel which contains
the will of every life-form in this world—
or perhaps the more poetic 'sentiment'
is a better word than 'will.' All manner of sentiments find their way
across the sea and into that egg, at which
point it exchanges them for power in the
Conjoined Worlds to which it is connected.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Some posit that a portion of the exchanged power
can be used to grant wishes, but this is mere
conjecture at the moment. Also, we have no idea
where Deus Maris goes once it ascends to heaven. Indeed, I've only just begun my journey
into researching this most magnificent
of marine creatures!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Yes, well, my thanks again for the help.
I will now be returning to my...ocean.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Gar, me head be achin' fit to split.
Did ye follow any of that, minnow?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Sentiment is drawn to Deus Maris's egg.
Do not concern yourself with the rest.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
So the egg came outta the sea because it was
respondin' to me sentiments? Yar, but there
be only one sentiment I have for true...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Ho, minnow! See where that black ship be
anchored? See the crack in the cliff beyond?
That be the base of the White Whale Pirates.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_010_.text:
And the blue ship belongs to the guardian
of Deus Maris, yet does not move.
So why is she here?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_020_.text:
If she came here for a fight, minnow,
we'd be seein' one already. Yar, but
Baltasar's ship is on alert regardless,
and we'll not be sneakin' past.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_020_.text:
We'll accomplish nothing by staring.
If this blue ship impedes us, we need
simply dispose of it. Also, I would much
like to meet the guardian of Deus Maris.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_020_.text:
A plan too bold even for ye, minnow.
We'll see how big ya are on that plan
after ya get the chance to meet Azure.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAVE_UNABLE_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAVE_UNABLE_000_C.text:
Only tars that be knowin' the route can sail
these caves on a ship, minnow; we're like
to sink if we try it. What should we do?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAVE_UNABLE_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAVE_UNABLE_000_C.text:
Then why not switch to a raft?
Such a craft would be able to
traverse the shoals with ease.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAVE_UNABLE_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_CAVE_UNABLE_000_C.text:
Yar, that be one way to do it.
Let's get back to the shipyard
and switch to our raft!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.text:
We be feelin' a raft ride today!
Have ye one we can plunder?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.text:
Sure. The one the two of you made
a while back is surprisingly sturdy,
so I've kept it tied to the pier.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.text:
One raft, square and true! Now we can get
through the reef without runnin' aground or
going through the sea caves—'cause there
be fiends in the caves, by gar!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.text:
Not sure I should be choosin' how we
approach this fight, minnow, so I'll
be leavin' that to you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.text: Mmm. What shall we do, then?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
The blue ship belongs to the guardian
of Deus Maris, yet does not move.
So why is she here?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
If she came here for a fight, minnow,
we'd be seein' one already. Yar, but
Baltasar's ship is on alert regardless,
and we'll not be sneakin' past.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
We'll accomplish nothing by staring.
If this blue ship impedes us, we need
simply dispose of it. Also, I would much
like to meet the guardian of Deus Maris.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
A plan too bold even for ye, minnow.
We'll see how big ya are on that plan
after ya get the chance to meet Azure.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
I met Azure at the harbor when I was but a
wee sprat. She was starin' a hole through me,
and I found it terrifyin'. Yar, it still shivers me timbers just to
think about it! Never did work up the guts
to talk to the lass.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
She cursed you. This Azure woman
has cursed you with fear.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Gar, but those eyes... If I see 'em...
Nay, we daren't.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Then look away, if you must—but know
that with the Dismal King at your side,
you have nothing to fear.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: I see no one. And yet...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Gar, it's just as the rumors say:
Azure pilots the Blue Demon alone!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: I am NOT alone!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: The souls of guardians move my ship. Many, many guardians.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
And what happened to these many,
many guardian souls that they now
find themselves in such a state?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
This is all you pirates' fault! You tortured
the guardians to learn more about Deus Maris,
then you killed them for fun! But I am now the final guardian, and I'm
going to make VERY sure that every pirate
pays for those crimes!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: She claims all is your fault.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Yar, I be no pirate! But I know
someone who was: me father.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
You were born and raised by pirates, Ivar!
Deus Maris doesn't want you making
a wish on the egg—the fact you lost it
in the cyclone is proof of that. Listen to me. Unless you want to die,
just go home and forget about this.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
And what are you doing here? Have you
come to steal the egg as its protector?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
I came to confirm whether or not Baltasar had
the egg—and planned to kill him if he did.
But since he's yet to obtain it, my work
in this place is pretty much wrapped up.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
And now I've a question for YOU, stranger:
Why do you pursue Deus Maris's egg?
Do you intend to make a wish?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: Yes. I seek chaos in this world.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: I need no wishes.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
If Deus Maris truly makes one's wishes
into reality, it might prove a lark to see
yet more darkness fill this world.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Wishes come at a price, stranger.
Best stand ready to pay the cost.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
The guardian spirits stir...
You must leave this place at once!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: The blue ship has departed.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Aye, but the guard on Baltasar's should be
down now, so the sneakin' will be easier.
So then, minnow, about what ye—

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: It is true I seek darkness. That said, I find it so much more fun to watch the people of this world squabble over a single pathetic wish.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
What will you wish for after such a fight?
The prospect of seeing this to the end
fills me with a grand excitement that
even Deus Maris cannot grant.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
A guardian... Do they even KNOW how hard
it was for me to take the egg away from 
them without their noticing?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
She said she was the last guardian,
but what does that even MEAN?
What happened to the Mare Nostrum
since Deus Maris granted my wish?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: Do not lie to me!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
You have come to our waters from an outer ocean
for a reason, stranger—and Deus Maris knows
what it is! You can hide nothing from him!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: A jest only, I assure you. Yet while it's true I seek darkness, I find it so much more fun to watch the people of this world squabble over a single pathetic wish.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
With the Blue Demon gone, the pirates be
lowerin' their guard and returnin' to land.
That's fair luck for us, minnow!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Yar, these be Baltasar's quarters.
Mangy cur's probably off drinkin'
himself under some table or another.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
By Deus Maris, there be a jade urn
on his desk! Can we really take it,
or is this a trap?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: Nothing happened.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: Yar, now let's be splittin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: Guard incoming!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Pirate1
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Yar, what be the password!?
I say hey—HEY!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: And then ho!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: All hail the Dismal King!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Pirate1
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Yar, by the hells! I didn't know you lot
were back already! Now take my shift!
I wanna go off and drink with all the
cute lasses while I still can!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: Very well. Go and carouse.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Pirate1
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Gar, ye think yer so important,
usin' big words like 'carouse'!
Well, I be more important than ye!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Pirate1
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: URK!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Stop clownfishin' around and get yer
damn cheeks back to the raft, minnow!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: Oh, very well.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Yar, Ivar! Ya really gonna come all this
way and not say hello to yer old man?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Yer only me father when it be convenient!
Ye treated me like dirt me whole life,
and I be wantin' nothin' to do with ye!
...Oh, and I'll be takin' this jade urn.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: Heh.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: Oh, there's more.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
You can take that with ye, Ivar,
but I'll be keepin' the cully here.
Seems useful, so he does.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
You have the makings of something great,
but not great enough to become a part of me.
Seek you even deeper darkness.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
A sailor from an outer ocean...
Aye, we've a dangerous shark in
our midst now, me hearties.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text: Ho! Scientist! Ye be in?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text: Nope!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Don't be lyin' to me, ye old salt,
or I'll have ye swabbin' the deck!
Now get out here!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Demanding little whippersnapper, ain'cha?
Here on behalf of the southern harbormaster,
I take it? Well, you can go pound sand!
I'm not signing any contract, nohow!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Then we'll be haulin' ye outta
here by force! Get 'im, lads!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
All right, all right! No need for that!
Kids these days, I swear... Fine, then. How does this sound?
You help me with a little experiment,
and I'll sign whatever you like.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Here's the experiment: will you press
the red button, or the blue?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Yar, this be not me forte, says I.
Go for it, minnow.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Do you remember the bard's song?
'High atop the tower, void of all
its light. The color that brings
happiness is of the sea so bright. Yet when this tale unfolds, what evil
should appear? The very worst of all
the beasts... The one all pirates fear!'

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text: WAH-HOOOOOO!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text: Was that an explosion?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
It's done! IT'S DONE! At long last, the lamp
has been destroyed! Now I don't have to be
the lighthouse keeper anymore! WAH-HOOO!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Damn yer brainy bones!
Ye used us!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Yes, and now I have a warning: ghosts tend to
appear in the lamp room, you see, and whenever
I turn the light on, they immediately switch
it back off again. Now, while I'm not afraid of some half-
baked apparition, they ARE rather a pain.
...Hence the explosives.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
EEEEP! GH-GH-GH-GHOOOOOOST! Oh, but I'm no good with violence.
You handle this.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Those don't be ghosts—they be fiends!
Get ready, minnow!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
How delightful this was, scientist!
Truly a worthwhile experiment.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
I'm glad you understand the joy that lies in
the endless possibilities within the choice
of whether or not to press the button!
It's no fun pressing it myself, you see.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
I got idea what ye be talkin' about.
But we did yer little experiment,
so get to signin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Yes, yes. Thankfully, I read the fine print,
which says that in the event the lighthouse
is destroyed, the occupant is under no
obligation to work. Aaaaaand...signed!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
About time! ...Yar, minnow, all that hagglin'
worked me up a fearsome appetite. Let's get
back to the southern harbormaster and eat!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
If this meal involves fiend meat,
you may have my portion.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text: What was that?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
It is done! Thanks to my triangular design,
my magnum opus is now launched! Looooook!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Gar, by all the slugs in the sea!
The Iron Island be MOVIN'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
With something so monstrous lurking about,
ships will stop coming to the bay entirely.
Why, we won't even NEED a lighthouse anymore!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Say, old man... Dare ye me
to be eatin' that thing?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Is food all you ever think about?
Yes, well, there you have it.
Contract signed.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Now then, I've no time to be conversing
with gluttons, so if you're finished here,
I'd kindly ask you to take a hike!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
That does not seem to be of this world;
we've no need to interact with it now.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
I'm impressed you handled that eccentric!
I just hope he didn't drag you into any of
his experiments with weird contraptions.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
He did that, aye. Couldn't make fin
nor tail of what he be askin',
but we made it out alive. I'm no good at this thinkin' stuff,
so I'm glad the minnow be with me.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
You helped out? Hey, thanks a bunch.
That just leaves retrieving the stolen
goods—which is a lot more difficult,
even if the reward IS pretty hefty.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Yar, ye'd have to be a mad dog
to go up against Baltasar.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Well. I can't force you to do it...
Plus there's really no point if you die.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
You have me. I would not lose to
a foe of his paltry caliber.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Gahar har har! Ye've got quite the swollen
head for a minnow! But if ye be so confident,
who be I to say nay?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
I'm so glad you found such a good
man to travel with you, little Ivar! That said, you should probably switch to a
raft if you're headed to the pirate base.
You won't be able to make it through
that tricky cave otherwise.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
This is the jade urn, all right; I'm impressed
you managed to get it back from Baltasar.
The client is going to be very happy.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
And now we be havin' enough treasure
for a new ship! Gahar har har!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Oh, I actually paid the shipyard before you
even set out. I mean, I knew you needed
that ship, so why not?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
By me dirty breeches, I...
I don't be knowin' what to say.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
You should give thanks to the
Dismal King, for starters.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Quit peepin' in on me private monologues,
ye meddlin' minnow! Gar, but thank ye, harbormaster.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Not a problem. Oh, but I'm afraid I'm not all
sunshine and lollipops today. There's a group
up north that wants to see you about the egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Yar, I figured. They paid the deposit fair
and true, and I ain't given 'em the goods.
I just hope they don't be sendin' me off
to the gallows...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Be careful, Ivar. The pirates around here
are growing more bold in their search for
the egg—they've even taken to attacking
each other as well as merchant ships.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
If they be havin' the stones to attack us,
we'll show 'em the color of their own guts!
Ain't that right, minnow!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text: Sounds delightful.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
There's a gleam in those eyes I believe!
Well, if you do happen to take them out,
bring their flag back to me and I'll
give you a fine reward.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text: Gar, now I hope they be attackin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
I welcome any hero brave enough
to challenge the Dismal King.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
I've got something good for you: equipment
said to belong to a pirate of legend. It's old and
worn, but you might get some interesting use
out of it if you enhance it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Yar, this be worn like an old boot...
But if it's a present from ye,
I'll be takin' it gladly!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Good luck. I tried using it in my younger
days, and things got...strange.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
It's finally time to get your own sailboat!
As always, the schematics need a little bit
of your own magic worked on them—and you
might find it a tad tricky this time around!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text: Yer up, minnow! Give it yer all!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text: Fine, I'll do it! Give it here!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Gar, this mighty ship'll let us be takin' on
some real jobs now—but we best fill our
bellies before we set sail for the north.
Come, ye deck-swabbers! Meals on me!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text: Regrets, but I cannot join you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Now, harbormaster. You will tell me
all you know of Deus Maris's egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Long ago, all eggs were raised by the guardians
of the Deus Maris. Whenever one hatched, they
would wish for Deus Maris to grow up healthy
and happy and send it on its way.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
I find it hard to believe a human would
abandon their own desires and wish for
the happiness of another.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Well, you clearly haven't met a guardian.
Regardless, Deus Maris blessed this world,
oceans thrived, and there was peace. I should also mention I heard that part of
the story from Azure, so it might just be
something she said to paint her and the
other guardians in a good light.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Anyway, one day, a pirate stole the egg and made
a wish. The seas turned wild and choppy, pirates
started fighting over the egg, and the peaceful
waters were no more.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
That was how things were at least as far back
as my grandpappy's time, so all that 'peaceful
ocean' stuff might be an old myth. Who knows.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Which means I must thank the pirates,
for I've no interest in a peaceful world.
Is Azure truly the last guardian?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Apparently. She doesn't age, so there's no
reason it couldn't be true, but I have a
hard time believing much of anything she says. I mean, she's never said what the
guardians actually DID to protect
Deus Maris, so...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Regardless, she possesses power
beyond that of a normal human.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
We're all wondering who's going to find the
egg and make a wish this time. Probably doesn't
matter—I just hope the wish doesn't make
things worse for all of us who live here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Yar, that was a feast! Now we sail for the
northern harbor, lads! There's pirates about,
so keep a wary eye!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Gar, could it be?
Is Deus Maris callin' me?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Our ship will not break this time.
Now let us be off.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text: Deus Maris's egg! It's back!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
It seems the cyclone appeared with the
express purpose of giving the egg back
to this man. He must be special indeed.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Pirate_Leif
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
I knew it, ye dog! Ye came to the cyclone
because ye have the egg! Well, ye might
be the son of both Sigurd and Baltasar,
but ye'll never win against me!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Ah, a pirate chasing the egg.
What shall we do?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
I'll lay me bones in the cold ground
before I be handin' this egg over!
We be takin' it to the northern harbor.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text: Perhaps this is Deus Maris's will.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text: Shall we kill them?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Gar, yer right. Take it, ye scoundrels!
Take it and begone from me sight!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Pirate_Leif
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Har har! Yer a smart one, cully—maybe
ye'll live longer than most. Farewell!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Yar, though that egg could have been makin'
us rich, dead men spend no coin. We be doin'
the right thing there, says I.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Ah, of course. Humans flock to coin.
I believe I could have seen a new
depth to the darkness, and greatly
regret our choice now.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
What's done be done, minnow. The egg be goin'
to Baltasar, for the northern harbor is
his stompin' ground. By givin' that pirate the egg, we be forcin'
him to fight Baltasar—which means all the
pirates are gonna be weaker! Gahar har!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
I'd not thought you clever enough
to mine the depths of such a plan.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Listen close, minnow: all that be matterin'
is who hatches the egg at the end. Now keep
yer head down and make for the north!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Yar, we best be hurryin' to the northern
harbor before the rest of those lice-
infested scum be catchin' up to us.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Pirate_Leif
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Now yer wounded AND ye've lost the egg.
A stupid decision! Everyone be knowin'
only the smartest sailors survive on these
here seas. Farewell, chumps! Bwa ha ha!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
I can't believe my power
had no effect...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Gar, it be fine, minnow; it'd only end up in
Baltasar's claws anyway if we took it north,
for the harbor be his stompin' ground. Aye, better to be lettin' the egg go
and make the pirates squabble over it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
But did you not want the reward
for transporting the egg?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Don't be speakin' that aloud, minnow!
Ohhh, me poor precious egg...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
AAARGH! You let the egg go!
Now what am I going to do!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
AAARGH! You lost the egg!
Now what am I going to do!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Let's cut to the chase, Captain!
Where's the damn egg!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Yar, she be here, just as promised.
And your end'a the deal, cully?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Oh ho! Deus Maris's egg! It's miiine!
Thank the stars! I'd have been dead meat
if this deal fell through. Right then. Here's your money.
Now take it and get out!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Yar, now we can be payin' back
the southern harbormaster.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Why was that man so frightened? 
He showed no joy in obtaining the egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Because the egg's bein' sent
straight to Baltasar.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text: Mmm.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Baltasar will never be lettin' the egg go,
which means we always know just where it be.
All we do now is steal it back from him
at the very last second! Gahar har har!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: MerchantShipSailor
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text: Captain! Huge cyclone, ahoy!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
