That be the Pillar to Heaven, or me name
not be Captain Ivar! Yar, it be puttin' all
the other cyclones to shame.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Thus does the main event
finally begin.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Aye, minnow—and so be we! Raise the
mainsail, lads! Hoist anchor! We be settin'
course for a cyclone!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Ah, I get it now. I just need to claim the egg
 at the very last moment, and I'll get my wish.
I won't mess this up—I WILL be a hero who
lives in a world of honor and faith!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text: The egg not be with me, says I.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
But I PAID you, you... You damn PIRATE!
Well, this is simply unacceptable.
Get out there right now and find it
before I lose my head!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Yar, I know where it be headed: to Baltasar,
strongest pirate in all the many seas.
Ye need not worry about it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Ye need not worry 'bout that neither!
I'll be handlin' that pox-faced louse.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Spoken like Baltasar's son, Captain.
Also, I'm holding you to that!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Ivar must have a death wish.
Doesn't he know Baltasar is immortal?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
What point is there in such resolve!?
It matters not without the egg!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text: Ho, Captain! Come here to trade?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
I be the captain of a trading vessel,
ye daft barnacle! What else would I
be doin' here!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
In that case, I have something special.
It's...a parrot!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
By gar, I've always been wantin' me
one'a those! Name yer price!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
Bring me sugar from the southern harbor.
I hear you'll receive it as a reward if you
take out the wanted pirates there.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
Gar, nothin' be so sweet as sugar...
But I've a deal fair and true for ye,
harbormaster! Ye be cookin' with that
sugar, and I'll be doin' the tastin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
Is EVERYTHING about food with you?
Oh, but fine. So I'm going to be making
a cake that looks like Deus Maris's egg.
You know, the one we use in the ceremony?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
The ceremony for the ocean's bounty?
The one where we be prayin' to Deus Maris?
Gahar har har! That be a fine cake indeed!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
You seem rather enthusiastic.
Is this 'parrot' particularly tasty?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
Nay, cully! Me father had a parrot, see—
came up plenty in the tall tales Baltasar
used to tell. But I've never been seein'
one meself, so I be curious.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
Mmm, I see. It's a strange sort of bird.
Shall we slay these pirates, then?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
The sugar be ready, harbormaster!
Now hand over me parrot!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
You seem VERY interested in this
arrangement. ...I'm suspicious.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
But you know what? I don't care.
I just want this thing out of my life!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
Thank the stars I can finally
get rid of this thing!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: Parrot
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text: SCREW YOU! SCREW YOU! GO GET BENT!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
And here's the cake for the ceremony.
It's just a test run, so please give me
your honest opinion. You too, sir.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
Yar, it be a magical explosion
of flavor in me mouth, says I!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
Mmm. Not bad. These flavors bring memories
flooding back from the corners of my mind.
Yet how does one use this in the ceremony?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
The moment Deus Maris's egg hatches,
we cut into this egg-shaped cake.
It's the traditional way to pray for
the ocean's bounty around here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: Parrot
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text: FOOD! FOOD! FOOOOOOD!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.speaker: Parrot
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.text: YOU'RE LATE, IVAR! LATE! SO LATE! STOP MESSING AROUND! GO FIND TREASURE!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.text:
Yar, but ye be a talkative runt! Yer name be Pedro, aye? Tell me more about
this treasure ye be speakin' of, for I
thought it sunk to the deep with me father.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.text: NOPE! HIDDEN AWAY! HIDDEN GOOD! CAPTAIN'S THOROUGH! HID IT AWAY!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.text: And you know where it is?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.text: THAT'S RIGHT! THAT'S RIGHT! MAP'S IN MY MIND! IN MY MIND! YOUR FACE IS STUPID!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.text:
I never knew me father was so cautious as
all that, but I guess ye have to be thinkin'
all the time when yer a pirate captain. Now where be the treasure, parrot!?
Spill yer guts!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.text: SCREW YOU! GO TO HELL! CRAM IT WITH WALNUTS!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.text:
Captain, I do believe this bird would
be fine eating if we slow-roasted it
over an open flame.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.text:
Yar, I be thinkin' the same, minnow.
Meat probably tastes awful, but a
generous helpin' of pepper be hidin'
all kinds of disgusting things!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.text: Now, cully, where be the treasure?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.text: SO SORRY. VERY RUDE. SO SORRY. SIGURD'S TREASURE IS IN THE NAVEL. OCEAN'S NAVEL.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.text:
Gar, that be the end'a nowhere!
No wonder no one ever found it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.text: SIGURD'S TREASURE! IVAR'S NOW! GO FIND IT! FIND IT!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PEDRO_TREASURE_HU.text:
Can this bird do no better in fooling us?
A pity he's naught but a low-grade fiend.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.text:
There be a chest here—a wee chest,
but a chest. What be inside, asks I?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.text: TREASURE! TREASURE! THANKS FOR THE TREASURE! SEE YOU IN HELL! ADIOS!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Damn me bones, I forgot he could fly!
After him, minnow!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.text: FOLLOWED ME! FOLLOWED ME! YOU SUCK! SUCK SO MUCH! SUCK EVERYWHERE AND ALL OVER!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Permit me to demonstrate just how much
the Dismal King does, indeed, 'suck.'

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.text: SORRY. SO SORRY. APOLOGIES. HERE. TREASURE. TAKE THE TREASURE.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Gar, but ye be a dreadful beast!
Now let's see what be inside...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.text:
...A plate? Yar, but this be
worth nothin' to nobody!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.text: JUNK! ALL JUNK! CAN'T BELIEVE IT! YOUR OLD MAN SUCKS! HOPE HE'S IN HELL!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.text:
If he ain't, me cully, I'll be sailin' to
the afterlife and sendin' him there! Want this treasure, minnow?
It mean nothin' to me.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.text: I see no reason to refuse.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.text:
We be done with ya now, Pedro. Fly away!
Soar with the rest of yer kind!
Be livin' yer best life!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.text: DON'T TELL ME TWICE! NOT TWICE! SO LONG, SUCKERS! SEE YA NEVER! ADIOS! ADIOS!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.text:
That was no bird, Captain.
Merely a garden-variety fiend.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BIRD_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Yar, I be thinkin' the same, minnow.
But does that mean me father was
never keepin' a true parrot after all?
Aw, it be matterin' none anyhow.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BATTLE_SHIP_000_C.speaker: BattleshipCaptain
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BATTLE_SHIP_000_C.text:
Prepare the type-three shrapnel shells.
We won't need armor-piercing ammunition
for wooden vessels.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BATTLE_SHIP_000_C.speaker: BattleshipLieutenant
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BATTLE_SHIP_000_C.text:
Type-three shrapnel shells
loaded and ready, sir!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BATTLE_SHIP_000_C.speaker: BattleshipLieutenant
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BATTLE_SHIP_000_C.text:
The enemy's pulling back, sir!
Should we pursue?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BATTLE_SHIP_000_C.speaker: BattleshipCaptain
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BATTLE_SHIP_000_C.text:
No. We're low on ammo, and don't know
how much farther we'll need to travel.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BATTLE_SHIP_000_C.speaker: BattleshipCaptain
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BATTLE_SHIP_000_C.text:
You're skilled indeed to have taken down my
most veteran unit! Beep beep! System error!
Manual mode engaged!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BATTLE_SHIP_000_C.speaker: BattleshipLieutenant
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BATTLE_SHIP_000_C.text:
Captain! I will be taking time off
to go with these people!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BATTLE_SHIP_000_C.speaker: BattleshipCaptain
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BATTLE_SHIP_000_C.text: What!? No fair! I want to go too!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BATTLE_SHIP_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_BATTLE_SHIP_000_C.text:
Yar, let's be gettin' outta here, minnow.
Leave the fools to their fool problems!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: PirateCaptain1
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text:
Still here, Captain Ivar? I hope ye
ain't come to ask for the egg back!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text: That I be, cully.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: PirateCaptain1
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text:
There be nothin' in all the Mare Nostrum
equal in value to the egg—which means
yer life be not worth the barter.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text:
I be aware of its worth, ye slack-jawed
barnacle scraper! That's why I be
takin' it back from ye!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text: We'll take the egg now.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: PirateCaptain1
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text:
Again? I be gettin' fed up with this.
Life's gonna be hard for ye if ye
never learn when to give up!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text:
We've retrieved the egg, but were also
tasked with securing proof of the kill.
Will a pirate banner suffice for this?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text: Yar, minnow! Fine work!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text:
Huzzah! They secured the egg!
Now don't let go of it!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: PirateCaptain1
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text:
Feel a bit awkward takin' a life when
the egg be watchin', so I'll spare ye.
Thank Deus Maris...and me! Har har!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: PirateCaptain2
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text: Give us the egg!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text: Mmm, I think not.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text: We'll take the egg now.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: PirateCaptain2
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text:
Har har har! Ye're makin' me laugh!
Get 'em, boys!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text:
Me thanks, minnow! Also, did ye know that
grog-addled poxmouth once snuck onto
me ship and stole all me jerky!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text:
Interesting. Well, with the egg safe,
our next task is to report back with
a pirate banner in hand. Shall we?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: PirateCaptain2
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text: Yar har ho! The egg be mine!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: PirateCaptain3
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text:
Har har har! Deus Maris's egg be mine!
Give it here, kiddos!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text: Nay, we'll not be doin' that!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: PirateCaptain3
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text:
Yer gonna pay for that, baldie!
Over here, all of you! Eat 'em up—
and don't be blamin' me for the taste!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text: We'll take the egg back now.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: PirateCaptain3
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text:
Nay, cully! I'm going be raisin' it and
makin' me my wildest dreams come true!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text:
Ye only dream of filth and bilge!
Now hand over the egg!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: PirateCaptain3
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text:
How dare ye make fun of me dreams,
baldie! Get back here!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text: The fiends are disposed of.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text:
And we be gettin' a flag, too. Yar,
but we be the finest pirate hunters
in all the seas! Gahar har har!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: PirateCaptain3
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text: Har har har! The egg be mine!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text:
The egg is safe, and the pirate banner we
obtained will serve as proof of the kill.
Shall we report in?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text:
The egg is safe, and the pirate banner we
obtained will serve as proof of the kill.
Shall we report in?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_PIRATE_HUNT_SHIP_.text:
The egg is safe, and the pirate banner we
obtained will serve as proof of the kill.
Shall we report in?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_PORT_PIRATE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_PORT_PIRATE.text:
Oh hey, a pirate flag! Thank you!
I clearly asked the right people
to handle this little mess.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_PORT_PIRATE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_PORT_PIRATE.text:
Here's your reward: a specialty
of our fine harbor.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_PORT_PIRATE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_PORT_PIRATE.text:
Just keep the pirate flags coming,
and you'll make us all very happy.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_PORT_PIRATE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_PORT_PIRATE.text:
Well, aren't you just a real go-getter?
Here's your reward—I hope it proves useful.
Now keep giving those pirates what-for!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_PORT_PIRATE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SOUTH_PORT_PIRATE.text:
The seas should be more peaceful now.
And as promised, here's your reward.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
The battle for the egg finally be upon us,
and there's no turnin' back once we start.
Are ye ready, minnow?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text: I stand ready.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text: I need a moment.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text: Yar, do as ye must.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
The Pillar to Heaven! Yar, now the egg'll
hatch for the first time in 25 years.
That's a long time, even for an immortal
soul like me! Bwaaa ha ha! Still, I suppose havin' an immortal
body DID come with its good points...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Your greed goes against the providence
of nature, you fell pirate! Do you not
see how it warps these waters!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Yar, I be a pirate...which means I give no
craps about nature! I'm happy, and that's
all that matters. That's the pirate way!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Stand down, minnow. Let 'em fight.
We just be here to watch and witness.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text: That is no option for us.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Pirate_Jorgen
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Well, well! If it isn't Ivar!
I'll never forget yer face—or what
ye owe me! Now hand over the egg!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text: Er, sorry. Who be ye?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Pirate_Jorgen
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Aaargh! Best ready yerself, damn you!
For once I kill ye, I'll be the leader
of the White Whales!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Ah, the egg reacts! It seems it has
little interest in traveling with you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Pirate_Gerd
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Come here to steal Baltasar's egg, Ivar?
Gar, that be adorable! I can't be waitin'
to see ye cry when he says 'Ye were
always a son to me, Wee Ivy!'

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Pirate_Gerd
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Well, tough! I don't be likin' garbage dramatics
like that—so instead I'll be snappin' yer head
clean off and usin' the spine to beat Baltasar
to death! Now THAT be drama!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
You are a woman of truly hackneyed tastes if
that is something you wish to watch—or perhaps
it is merely a manifestation of your fear that
the Dismal King may do the same to you?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Pirate_Gerd
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Ya gonna use the egg to make Baltasar human
again, Ivar? Maybe bring Daddy back to life?
D'aw, I bet he be so happy with ye!
Almost makes me cry...of BOREDOM!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Pirate_Gerd
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Listen up, blubber breath! The greatest pirate
in history will I be, and every man will be
me slave! But ho, at least ye'll never be
unemployed! Har har har!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
This one does not know when to stop talking.
Yet see you how honest the egg is, responding
to every word that spills from her vacuous maw!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
I suppose I should offer you my compliments
for protecting the egg this long, Captain—
but your role is done. As the last remaining guardian of
Deus Maris, I will take it from here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
I be a pirate's son by birth and rearing,
and that be why I'm the one who'll send
Deus Maris off to heaven!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
And what will you wish for then? The revival
of your birth father? The humanity of the man
who raised you? Or will you simply wish to
rule the seas like the selfish oaf you are!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Nay, I be wantin' none'a that. And yet,
me wish be between me and Deus Maris,
and it'll stay that way until the moment
the egg hatches and he ascends to heaven.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Hmph! And what reason might I have to
believe you, Ivar, Child of Pirates?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Tch! The stranger from another
ocean dares to interfere!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
I'm merely curious to know Ivar's wish—
and if seeing that through means doing
battle with one such as you, so be it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
You challenged me as a guardian,
which has earned my respect.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
To think a guardian was unable to safeguard
the egg... Must I again watch as the pirates'
greedy wishes rule the seas? O great Deus Maris! Show me your mercy
and end my powerless self!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text: Hark! The egg hatches!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Make me a hero, O Deus Maris!
A true hero full of honor and faith!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Yar, blast me bones! Where in the
seven seas did THIS guy come from!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text: You... You're that pirate!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
No! Why didn't it work!? Why!?
Can I not make the same wish twice!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Weird little interruption there...
But fine, I be makin' me wish again!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
I be havin' but one wish, Deus Maris...
Go back to heaven and never be
returnin' to these waters again!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text: Ivar...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text: Ah, I understand now.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
I must depart, Ivar—and I will
be taking Deus Maris with me.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Yar, maybe you were bein' its messenger
after all... Farewell, me wee minnow!
I hope ye grow big and strong!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
I believe it heard your wish.
Fare you well, Captain.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Without Deus Maris, we won't be needin'
a guardian, so what say ye to comin' along
with this old salt?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Do you really think Deus Maris
granted that wish of yours, Ivar?
That selfish, SELFISH wish!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Gar, lass! It wasn't selfish at all!
Without the eggs, there won't be no more
fightin'! That be best for everyone, yar?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Pirates are responsible for their own fights,
but Deus Maris is innocent—and you just
kicked him out of his own home. Do you
even know how much you've hurt him!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text: But I wasn't meanin' to—

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Stop. Regardless of your idiocy, Deus Maris
will return. And I will keep and protect the
next egg, for I am a guardian.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text: What have I done?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text: I could ask my idiot son the same!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text: Yar? Who be ye?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Can't believe my eternal youth ends after
25 years... Yar, but that wish was barely
worth the trouble! Still better than Baltasar's immortality
though, for he be dead! Bwaaa ha ha!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text: Are ye...me father?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Aye, I be the great pirate Sigurd of
the White Whales—and your father! And since I still be young and spry,
I'd best start plannin' my wish for
when the next egg appears! Bwa ha ha!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
By me bones, it all be comin' round!
Deus Maris... Me father... Hell and damn,
what should I even be wishin' FOR!? Yaaar, I need to be stress-eatin'!
I'm gonna chow down on every last fiend
I can find! OUTTA ME WAAAY!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Ahhh... So my beloved son is to be
my final challenger...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
I let ye have Deus Maris's egg for a bit,
Baltasar, but now I be takin' it back.
'Twas far easier this way, says I!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
You think ya won somethin' here, Ivar?
WRONG! Deus Maris's egg belongs to ME now,
and it's had plenty of time to absorb me wish!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Yar, and I bet it be sick of hearin'
all yer nonsense. Now hand it over
before I take it from yer dead hands!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
It's a shame you never did inherit
yer real father's cunning...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
I need not hear your wish to know what you
desire—yet I have no interest in your cravings
whatsoever. Now give us the egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
The sailor from an outer ocean!
What's your game here!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
I believe Ivar's wish will be far more
entertaining than yours—but know this!
If you aim to fight back, the Dismal King
will grant you no mercy.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Yar, enough talk! I'll be sendin'
ya both to a watery grave!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text: Ah, so you're immortal.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Yar, has Ivar told ya nothing? Hm...
Sounds like he don't trust ya.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Yer immortality ends here, me cully...
Time's up on the last wish.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Aye, perhaps... But it's more than
enough time to drown ya both!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Mmm. I thought this was supposed to
be a simple thing for you, Baltasar.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Damn yer eyes, the both of ya!
I refuse to believe ya managed this!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Baltasar's actin' all different...
Don't be holdin' back, minnow!
Time to send him to the afterlife!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text: Taste now the power of the dark!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Baltasar's immortality has come
to an end, which means...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text: Hark! The egg hatches.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Yar, it be time. I know not what matter of
nasty wishes it was gettin' from pirates,
but mine will push 'em all aside!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text: And what will you wish for?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text: Ivar, you—

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Hear me plea, Deus Maris! I wish ye
to grow strong and true...and that
ye'll return again to these seas!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text: Let me be holdin' the egg again.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text: That is your wish? Not quite what I hoped for, but perhaps it is a good thing in the end. But with this, the time has come for me to take my leave of these seas as well.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
You have been a great help to me, and I also took
no small amount of pleasure from venturing on the
waves. I know Deus Maris will honor your wish.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
I should be the one thankin' ye, minnow.
May all yer sailin' be smooth.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Are ye good with me wish, Azure? Maybe not
so fine as a guardian would make, but I did it
for the sake of Deus Maris true.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
I didn't think you understood a
guardian's heart, Ivar, but that... Well, it was exactly what a guardian
would wish for—although asking to hold
the egg was probably a bit much.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Yar, that part of the wish was just for me.
Guessin' I was wrong to do it?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Oh, it's fine. Deus Maris was actually
delighted—moreso than any time I can
remember seeing him off, in fact.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
I thank ye for sayin' so, lass.
Makes all the hard work I put in
worth it—though I suppose the wee
minnow deserves most of the credit.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text: So who was that, anyway?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
No clue, says I—but I doubt that wee minnow will
be around when the next egg comes 'round.
Don't know how I'll be protectin' it from
the pirates without him...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text: You will—because you'll have me.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
What the...? Oh, come ON! I didn't get
to do ANYTHING here! How could ya forget
Sigurd, great pirate of the White Whales!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Well, I'll be the one to take the egg next
time. Sure, I got my immortality, but it
was borin' as hell, so I need to be comin'
up with a fine wish—unlike Baltasar! Wishin' for immortality and dyin'
at the end? Yar, what a fool!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
I'll be the main character next time!
Remember that, me cullies!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text: Please explain why you came all the way out here on a raft.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
We seek to determine Deus Maris's will
by sailing about and slaying fiends.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
Deus Maris's will is nigh unknowable even
to us guardians! What makes you think
YOU could possibly understand it!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
All is as you say: we learned nothing of what
it thinks. And yet, Deus Maris also guided
us to the Pillar to Heaven on this raft,
which means our wishes will not be ignored.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_LAST_.text:
You may be right, at that...
So let me test you to see
if his guidance is real!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
It seems there was power in more than just
your raft—and if that power came from
Deus Maris, his wish rightly belongs to you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Been a pleasure true to sail the Mare Nostrum
with ye, minnow! Life on the seas be painful,
but that just be the way of her... Which is why I'll be wishin' that the Mare
remain the beautiful sea she be! We live by
the water and die by the water, and I thank
Deus Maris for the blessin' of it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
No one... No one has ever wished
for that before, Ivar.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Every wish comes with a price...
Overcome Deus Maris's trial...
Ah. I see. I shall make your wish
come true for you, Captain.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
I bid you farewell, Ivar.
Deus Maris has heard your wish.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Yar, and there goes me wee minnow...
Ho, Carolina! His be a tale worthy
of a song! Sing us a shanty!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Carolina
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
I'll sing ye a tale that's fit for a squid:
A tale of a man named the Damsel Kid!
He sailed on a raft both strong and true.
Now blow me bully boys, blow! Here did the stranger come!
He proved himself a mighty fine chum!
We hope his hopes and dreams are won!
Now blow me bully boys, blow!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Yar, we of the Mare live and die by
our songs! Ain't that right, Azure?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLD_QUEST_ENDIN.text:
Don't bring me into this. Aye, but that sailor from another
ocean was a strange one indeed...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.text:
One moment, if you don't mind. Would it
be fair to say that you've developed quite
a fondness for your raft?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_Q1.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_Q1.text:
Ah, I see that look on your face!
That's the look of a man who harbors
a love for rafts so great it rules over
every aspect of his life. Am I right?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.text:
Oh, but this raft is a beauty...
Its triangular nature is simply sublime.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.text:
As a naval architect specializing in triangular
structures, this vessel of yours has convinced
me that rafts are, indeed, the most superior
of all sailing crafts...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.text:
Which is why I just HAD to make a few
adjustments to its construction so it
would be the best raft it could be!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.text:
Hop aboard, my friend! Journey on the
finest raft there ever was or will be!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.text:
It appears normal in every
respect to me, but very well.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.text:
Don't make light of this simple raft, sir!
While it looks like an ordinary craft at
first glance, I made it as light and
sturdy as possible!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.text:
Put simply, I worked with the scientist
at the lighthouse to improve it so much
that it can travel through cyclones.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.text:
Alas, I fear it's unsuited for battle.
The scientist said some weird stuff
about it turning into a sailboat, but...
Well, anyway. There you have it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.text:
A ship that can withstand a cyclone?
Mmm. Now we can see Deus Maris.
You have my thanks, architect.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.text:
No, no! I must thank YOU! To be honest,
I've actually been stealing peeks at
your logs and other such things.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.text:
In the end, I'm merely grateful I was able
to bring life to such a glorious vessel.
Good sailing to you, my friend!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_STRONGEST_RAFT_00.text:
My apologies, then.
Enjoy your raft as it's always been.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
A moment, if you please? I don't mean
to brag, but the scientist from the
lighthouse came by the other day.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text: And would you believe it? That man of science took a great interest in the sloop I built. That I built!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
He asked me about it down to the tiniest
detail. Clearly this is because my work
is beautiful and perfect and beautiful!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
Yar, I be happy for ye! And if this sloop
truly be so fine, I'll be switchin' over
to that beauty at once!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
Also makes me think we might discover
somethin' nice if we go see the scientist.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text: Shall we visit the lighthouse later?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text: Be ye here, old man!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text: Nope!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
Gar, ye dirty liar! I see ye!
Now spill it: why be ye takin'
such an interest in our sloop?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
Ah, so that was yours! Quite the little
number, actually; the moment I saw it,
I took some measurements and made...THIS!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
Avast, ye brain-havin' dog!
Keep yer cursed gadgets off me ship!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
Don't you get smart with me, son!
This 'cursed gadget' is actually
a special device that triangulates
the location of spectral energy!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
And what, pray tell,
is 'spectral energy'?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
Can't be bothered to give you the whole schpeel,
so I'll keep it short: the thing finds ghosts.
There is a terrifyingly unscientific thing on
these seas called a ghost ship. Find it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
And why be we doin' this, old man?
Have ye an old flame aboard?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
I wish! But no. What I have is more of... 
Well, let's call him an acquaintance.
I lent him something ages and ages
ago and I want it back.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
You have a ghost friend?
What a curious human you are.

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.text:
Avast, ye ghosts! Any of ye who know an
old man in a lighthouse, come show yer
sheet-covered hides to Captain Ivar!

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.text:
These are all inferior spirits.
How disappointing.

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.speaker: Pirate_Ghost
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.text:
Only man I know who be chummy with that
old shark is Captain Sigurd himself.

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.text:
...Sigurd? Did ye say Sigurd?
By chum, was this me father's ship!?

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.speaker: Pirate_Ghost
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.text:
Could it be...? Are ye truly wee Ivar?
Look at the size of ya, lad! Why, yer even
bigger'n me—not to mention older and uglier!
Gahaaar har har har har!

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.text: Be Sigurd the pirate on this ship!?

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.speaker: Pirate_Ghost
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.text:
Would I be lazin' about if the captain
were here to put a boot up my rear,
ya daft bald fellow? Nay, Captain made his wish to Deus Maris
and it came true. He lives in a world far
distant from ours now.

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.text:
Well, we be lookin' for a fancy bauble
Sigurd borrowed from a scientist.
Know ye where his ship went down?

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.speaker: Pirate_Ghost
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.text:
Aye, the Killer Whale sunk in Dead Man's Bay.
'Twas apparently Deus Maris's will that her
entire crew be doomed to sail the Mare Nostrum
until the end of days. 'Course, the good captain escaped that
fate, but we be plenty happy without him.

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.text: Yar, that be all we need.

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.speaker: Pirate_Ghost
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.text:
Take care, wee Ivar—and fight well!
I pray yer work allows the rest of us
to finally be knowin' rest.

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.text:
The stench of the smoke billowing from
the scientist's spectral gadget is enough
to water even the Dismal King's eyes.

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_BASE_GHOST_SHIP_000_CU.text:
It be fine, for I know where we be headed!
Still, Dead Man's Bay be naught but rock
and ruin, so we best be gettin' a raft.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
Stay put, ye wee minnow.
I'll be divin' down real quick.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
As decisive as always. Are all the
humans in your world like this?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
Yar, here be the gadget! Let's be bringin'
it back to the old man in the lighthouse.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
We could perhaps locate your father if we
used this phantasmal gadget once more.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
Bah! I got no need for that slackloafer!
We be busy men, ye and I, and can't let
ourselves be distracted.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
Oh ho, this is it! Oh, but I am a genius!
Honestly, it's just some old thing I threw
together on a whim, but I'm happy to see
it sensed ghosts like I wanted.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
Yar, but the fancy gadget ye put
on our ship be no more.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
Yes, I designed it to self-destruct after
coming into contact with a ghost ship.
Prolonged exposure to spiritual entities
is dangerous for men of science, you see.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
...Oh, fiddlesticks! The device you
brought back is ALSO broken!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text: Explain said device to me.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
Oh, it creates distortions
in space-time that... Whoopsie! Let that slip.
But that's all you'll get from me!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
Now then, friend! Allow me to give you
this mysterious sealed box. It's up to
you whether or not you want to open it!
Hoo hoo! Hoo hoo ha!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
That box be massive, says I!
Sure hope she doesn't blow
if we be openin' it...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text: Well, minnow? Do we open it?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text: Yes.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text: No.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
Gar, I knew this would happen!
Curse that old man!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text: Tsk. What a pain.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
Yer right—don't trust it one bit.
Let's be leavin' it here and go.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_SLOOP_SHIP_GHOST_.text:
What an eccentric man, to leave us
his thanks by way of a fiend.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
Yar, yer finally awake. So, uh,
do ya know where we be? Best I can figure, we be on another
pirate ship. Those dogs sank me vessel,
so I don't know where else we'd be.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
I know only that I was suddenly
cast into the water.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
Well, I be Ivar, captain of a tradin' vessel—
and if we do be captured by pirates, they'll be
workin' us till the skin slips off our bones. Yar, but this be too quiet for a pirate ship,
says I. Where be the shoutin'? The cursin'?
The sea shanties?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
That's because we're on the Dead Man's Ship, 
sailing the Sea Betwixt that exists between
life and death. Deus Maris willed you to be here,
and as I am the Deus Maris's guardian,
I intend to see his will done.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
The air here reminds me of Yomi;
I think I will be quite comfortable
in this place. Now then, what does this 'Deus Maris'
intend to ask of me?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
Right now, you hover between life and death.
But the Dead Man's Ship will return to the Sea
of the Dead erelong. If you're aboard when
that happens, you die. If you escape, you live.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
Yar, ye be Azure the Guardian? I be hearin'
tales about ye that be puttin' even the
fiercest of sea dogs to shame! Now tell me this, lass: what be yer plan?
For if it be Deus Maris's will that we be
here, does that mean he be savin' us?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
That all depends on you, my cully.
The voice you hear is an echo from
the Sea of the Living; if you can
respond, you'll be taken back there.
Ivar! Answer me, damn you!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
Yar, that voice be Baltasar the pirate—
the same lice-ridden cuttlefish what
sank me Sea Turtle!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
Hold. While we're here, we should take time to
enjoy the uncanny space between life and death.
But to do so, we must find a way to escape
this voyage to the Sea of the Dead.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
Yar, which means we be needin' another ship.
Usually I'd be askin' the shipyard boss
for one, but...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
Well, lucky you: there IS a shipyard
in the Sea Betwixt. Can't promise they'll
actually work with you, but there you go.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
Deus Maris has shown your paths!
Will you return to the Sea of the Living
even if it means damning yourself to the
life of a pirate captive? Or will you attempt to secure true freedom,
even at the risk of being dragged off to
the Sea of the Dead? As a guardian,
I will be watching you very closely.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
How about ye be helpin'
instead of watchin'!? Gar damn it all,
what should we do here?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
The Dismal King will respect
what choice you make.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text: You too? Why's all this fallin' on me?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text: Pirates or no, it's back to Sea of the Livin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text: Yar, we be findin' another way out!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
Yar, minnow! Azure said there be a
shipyard here, so we need to find it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text: Leave all to me.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text: Why in the waves be ye so confident!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text: The shipyard is that way.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
If ye say so, minnow. I'll do as ye say—
but if ye get it wrong, I'll be throwin'
yer useless carcass over the side!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text: Pirates, Deus Maris, guardians... Can it truly be? No. There are pirates wherever there are seas, and any ocean's bound to have a protector god. Plus, there are guardians of all sorts everywhere, so no. This isn't the Mare Nostrum. It can't be.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text: *cough*

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
Good, yer breathin' again. Didn't think you
were the type to kick the bucket so easily,
Ivar—'cause I raised ya hardy! Bwa ha ha!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
Gar, ye blasted bilge rat! That be no way
to talk to the man whose ship ye sunk!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
Looks like the rest of yer crew found
peace in the afterlife—well, except
for this lucky cully here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
Yar, but here's the thing: we were fightin'
monsters and killers, and yer ship just
happened to get caught in the crossfire. Sorta yer fault for sailin'
right into it, says I.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
Ye lyin' shrimp-sucker! I lost me ship,
me mates, and me crew, and it all be
because of ye!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
Nothin' to be done for it, me son;
'tis all the will of Deus Maris.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
Yer gonna be busy before long, son,
so go make yerself comfy down in
the hold and get some sleep.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
So you intend to obey that
fiend without question?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
We'll pretend to do so and lower his guard—
though I've no idea if we'll be sold off at some
harbor or worked like dogs on this ship
for the rest of our miserable lives. Still better than driftin' on that ghost ship,
says I—least we be havin' a chance to escape
from this one.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_SECOND_START_PROCESS_0.text:
I hope that chance comes soon; I cannot
envision anything of particular note
taking place on this ship.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text: Yar, Ivar! Yer up.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text:
There be somethin' shiny at
the bottom of the blue hole...
Are ye tellin' me I have to...?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text:
Bwa ha ha! Ya always were a smart lad!
Now dive in there and grab it for me.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text: I'd rather be keelhauled, by gar!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text:
Look, it's easy! Take this heavy stone
so ya sink real quick, grab the goods,
drop the stone, and we pull ya up!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text:
I can't ever tell if yer jokin'
with that face ye got... Also, ye be immortal, so why don't YE
dive down there instead'a me!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text: Well...yar. Guess I could do that.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text:
Right, lads! Tie a rope 'round your boss
and find a stone to sink him. Nothing too
heavy, now—ye don't wanna be snappin'
those little twig arms!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text:
Do as yer told, boys—and make sure these
two slippery eels don't run away while
I'm down there!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text: Is that fiend truly immortal?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text:
Aye, lad. He made a wish to Deus
Maris's egg for an eternal body.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text: Explain this.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text:
Gar blast, minnow! Don't tell me ye don't
be knowin' about Deus Maris's egg!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text:
I do not—but it matters not. I am Siugnas,
the Dismal King, and I have come here
in search of darkness most fantastical.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text:
Come here from an outer ocean for darkness,
have ye, Damsel Kid? Well, now I be seein'
why ye don't know squat! But if we must,
Deus Maris's egg be—

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text:
Got it, by chowder!
I got Deus Maris's egg!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text:
...Be that thing there, actually.
And once it hatches, it'll make
a wish come true for ye.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text:
All we gotta do now is wait for the Pillar
to Heaven to appear. Oh, but don't worry—
once me wish comes true, I'll make sure
there's something good in it for you, too.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text:
That's Deus Maris's egg... How much time
has passed since my own wish came true?
Also, did that monster really say he got
immortality by wishing on the egg?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text:
Ah! Of course! I'll make ANOTHER wish on
the egg and become a true hero! A man who
lives by honor and faith, just like the heroes
of that world!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text:
Don't see any cyclones that fit.
Guess we gotta be feedin' the egg more!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text: Does Deus Maris's egg eat?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_HOLE_0.text:
Well, aren't you a lucky fella!?
Keep control of the wheel for
a while longer, eh, lad?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.text:
The Mare's fiends lurk in such whirlpools,
which makes 'em perfect fodder for me wish.
Stand back, lads! Fire in the hole!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.text:
Ya got both luck AND skill, lad, so what say
ya join me crew? 'Tis a far better deal than
stickin' with that barnacle-scraper Ivar.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.text:
If you show me the darkness I crave,
I will consider your offer.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.text:
Bwa ha! I like the cut'a yer jib, lad—
yer talkin' like a true man grown!
Now take the rudder and steer us
to the next feedin' ground!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.text:
Yar, it be rare to see Baltasar in such
a fine mood, so we'd best do what we can
to keep him happy.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.text:
Bwa ha! I'll bet me last eye there
be fiends in this whirlpool!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.text:
Yer a shameful excuse for a pirate, Baltasar!
Ye should be plunderin' and maraudin',
not chasin' after fiends!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.text:
Shut yer blowhole, Ivar! These fiends
be more important than any treasure.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.text:
Pathetic. Are there no fiends
in this world with bite?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.text:
Hear that, ya dogs!? You can learn from this guy!
If ya don't work, you don't eat—so the next one
of ya scurvy bilge rats that whines about fiends
is gonna get thrown into a whirlpool!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.text:
A whirlpool? Mmm. I admit no small level
of curiosity about a chance to peer into
the depths of such darkness.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.text:
Bwa ha ha! Oh, but I love people like you
who've got all their damn screws loose!
Now onward to the next feedin' ground!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_UZUDUNGEON_.text:
There may be a chance to get the egg
at this rate, but... No. I should hold
off until the Pillar to Heaven appears.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_INCIDENT_00.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_INCIDENT_00.text:
That big wave must be from a killer whale,
so that'll be our next feed. Yar, but there
be two waves, so choose wisely!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BIGWAVE_KRA.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BIGWAVE_KRA.text:
Bwa ha ha! We got it!
Time to fight the whale!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BIGWAVE_KRA.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BIGWAVE_KRA.text:
Yar, the egg be ready! Now all we gotta do
is wait for the Pillar to Heaven to appear.
Don't be missin' it, ya scoundrels!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BIGWAVE_KRA.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BIGWAVE_KRA.text:
I know he be plannin' to wish for some no-
good thing, but there be nothin' we can do.
And what of ye, minnow? Are ye still on track
to see yer own plans through to the end?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BIGWAVE_KRA.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BIGWAVE_KRA.text:
Yes, but I cannot speak to its progress.
I hope to learn more as things unfold.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BIGWAVE_KRA.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BIGWAVE_KRA.text: Yar, it all be restin' on Baltasar.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BIGWAVE_DRA.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BIGWAVE_DRA.text:
Wrong wave, ya chumbucket—and now the
Blue Demon's coming right for us! All hands, ready for battle! Defend this
egg with yer pathetic, worthless lives!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BIGWAVE_DRA.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BIGWAVE_DRA.text: I am no chumbucket. I am Siugnas.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BIGWAVE_DRA.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BIGWAVE_DRA.text:
Yar, but now be our chance, minnow!
Keep quiet and we'll be escapin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.text:
I'm surprised you survived Baltasar's ship.
Now tell me what you're doing here
before I gut you like a fish.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.text:
Baltasar seeks to avoid your ship,
for he holds Deus Maris's egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.text:
Wait, BALTASAR has Deus Maris's egg!?
No! He musn't be allowed to make a wish!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.text:
Yar, that gar-damned cretin be shootin' at
the Blue Demon even though we be aboard!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.text:
Damn... We withdraw for now.
We'll have to get the egg another time.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.text:
Can ye take us along? I've no desire
to be goin' back to Baltasar.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.text:
It is Deus Maris's will that you return
to his ship—and it will also make things
much easier for me when it comes time
to retrieve the egg. Now move it!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.text:
D'aw, how cute! You two trout-heads
actually came back to me! Well, hope yer ready to work like dogs!
Bwaaa ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.text:
While I am not fond of acting according to
Deus Maris's will, I trust he's some arrangement
in mind if he wishes me to follow this man.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.text:
Looks like the egg needs feedin'...
Let's go find some danger, boys!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_BLUE_DRAGON.text:
That guardian moves with perfect timing!
If they'd stayed on the Blue Demon,
their chance to retrieve the egg
would have been lost.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_GHOST_BATTL.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_GHOST_BATTL.text:
A ghost ship! I'd normally not be touchin'
one'a those, but the egg's got a hankerin'
to devour the grudges of the dead.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_GHOST_BATTL.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_GHOST_BATTL.text:
Those spirits were nothin'...
Barely fed the damn egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_GHOST_BATTL.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_GHOST_BATTL.text:
Is there a relation between
battle and the egg?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_DEATH_COVE_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_DEATH_COVE_.text: Yar, this be Dead Man's Bay!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_DEATH_COVE_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_DEATH_COVE_.text:
The spirit of a terrible pirate rests here—
well, he's not doing much RESTING, if ya get
me meaning. Aye, he's got his eyes wide open,
and he's listenin' real careful-like...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_DEATH_COVE_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_DEATH_COVE_.text:
Ya hear me, Sigurd? I got Deus Maris's egg—
and soon as it hatches, I'm gonna make me a
whole new wish! Aye, I wished for immortality and you for
eternal youth, and they both turned sour—
but we'll set it all to rights soon!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_DEATH_COVE_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_DEATH_COVE_.text:
I know yer enjoyin' yer eternal youth in the
Sea Betwixt, but me next wish is gonna make
me the biggest player on the seas! And if that don't sit well with ya,
why not come out? I know ya can do it!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_DEATH_COVE_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_DEATH_COVE_.text:
Hell, if ya fall into the Sea of the Dead,
you can return as a ghost and hang with me!
I know ya missed me, after all! Yar har! Also, I'm gonna getcha a little gift so it'll
be easier for ya to get here—we need us a
sacrifice to connect the Sea of the Living,
the dead, and the in-between, after all!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_DEATH_COVE_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_DEATH_COVE_.text:
Now's yer chance to make both yer dads proud,
Ivar—it's the whole reason yer still alive,
And...thanks for everything. I love ya, Son.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_DEATH_COVE_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_DEATH_COVE_.text:
C'mon now, Sigurd! Yer the last
piece of the puzzle I need to get
this show on the waves!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text:
Yar, the egg be ready!
Now grant me wish, Deus Maris!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text:
That fiend transformed into a little fish.
Is that truly what he always wanted?
I find this unexpectedly adorable.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text: Wait! Come back!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text:
My chance has finally come...
Make me a hero, O Deus Maris!
A true hero of honor and faith!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text: Yar, thought I be a goner there...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text: No. You are alive.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text:
Aye, minnow. The moment I woke in the waves,
I started eatin' all the wee fish in the sea.
That be givin' me the strength to climb all
the way back up here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text:
That fish was a little
present from Deus Maris.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text:
A FISH for a present?
Deus Maris be cheapin' out on me...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text:
I felt your power amidst the battle.
Explain what transpired.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text:
All I be knowin' is that I had a weird
dream where me father and me fused.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text:
Ah. Well, I fear I must away before the Pillar
to Heaven vanishes, but then what of you?
If you wish it, Captain, you may join me
as I venture into the seas beyond.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text: Aye, that be soundin' fine!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text: Nay, minnow. I be tired.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text: Then we are off.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text:
That is your choice, and it is fine.
Fare you well, Captain.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text:
Yar, the Pillar to Heaven!
At last, everything's in place
for me wish to come true!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text:
Ye mean everything's in place for the
egg to hatch for SOMEBODY, yeah?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text:
Shut yer gob! I worked like a damn beaver
to instill the breath'a battle into the egg,
and I'm gonna be the one to hatch it!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text: Then make your wish with haste.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text:
O, Deus Maris! If ya feel the power of the fiends,
I ask ya to grant it to me! Aye, but this measly
body cannot hold that much power, so I'll be
needin' a bigger one... Which is why I'm wishin' for a body
larger than any ship in the Mare Nostrum!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text: Gar, THAT be his wish!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text:
Is this why you brought me here, Deus Maris?
Can this dark only be consumed by an even
deeper darkness? Well, I shall forgive you for using me
this time, so long as you watch as I
unleash the power of true darkness!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_.text:
So this is the nature of this world's darkness,
is it? It seems the thing I sought lay somewhere
beyond your choice.
