SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Ye can have yer damnable heart back,
Baltasar—but I be takin' the egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Fine, whatever. This egg don't mean
nothin' when set against me heart.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Now hear me well, boy: I know I caused
ya plenty of pain, but I did it outta love.
So you'll make me wish come true, aye?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Don't listen to that pirate's rubbish, Ivar!
Give the egg to a guardian so the Mare can
return to being the happy sea it once was.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Why'd ye make me claim Baltasar's heart, Azure!?
Were ye plannin' to have me dirty me hands with
killin' him while yer own stayed clean—and all
while leadin' Deus Maris astray!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Ivar, listen to—

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Oh, ignore this lass, Ivar. I've been tricked
by guardians more times than I can count—
though I eventually went and hung 'em for it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Sigurd!? Ivar, please don't tell me you
brought him here from the Sea Betwixt!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Aye, my precious son brought me here as an
envoy of Deus Maris. Brought me back to
the Sea of the Living on his ship, so he did! Fate be on my side, Baltasar, which is
why I'm takin' the White Whales back!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
This is YER fault, ya daft jellyfish!
YER the one who worded yer wish funny! Yar, don't listen to him, Ivar...
Not unless ya wanna end up like me.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Stow it, all of ye! I know what I be wishin' for,
and it's to get out of this coral-blasted ocean
for good and all! I'm sick of it, by gar!
Sick to death of it all!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
And the one who'll be makin' that wish come
true is ye, Damsel Kid. Aye, we be gettin'
outta this hellhole together. So go on, minnow. Make yer wish.
I know it'll be comin' true.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Very well.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
I wish darkness for this world, O Deus Maris!
May the people of these seas fight over
your egg and favor for an eternity!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Bwaaa ha ha! I know ya heard Deus Maris's
voice. Whoever kills this sailor from another
ocean gets to have their wish come true.
Well then, don't mind if I do!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Me first! Me first!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Then I shall grant those who seek conflict
exactly what they want—for I am Siugnas,
the Dismal King, and I will use my power to
fill this world with fantastical darkness!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Bwa ha ha! That's one Baltasar down!
What're you gonna do, Azure!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
I will not permit your wish
to come true, Sigurd!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
First Baltasar and now you!?
Yer stronger than I thought!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Gar, enough! I know when I'm bested!
Have fun in the other ocean, Ivar,
but I be leavin'.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Finished already? Then I suppose
the time has come for me to
abandon this place as well.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Wait, Count! I'm going to be a true hero,
one of honor and faith!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Then you mean to make your wish come true
by defeating me? If so, the Dismal King stands
ready to face you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Nnngh... No! I can't! 
Dammit, I can't defeat you!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Apologies for the wait.
It is time to depart.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Aye, time to bid farewell
to these decrepit waters.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Farewell, me sea...
Farewell, me Mare Nostrum...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
And just like that, all my nuisances are gone.
Guess I'll just take it easy while I wait for
the next egg. The era of Sigurd awaits!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
I was never able to put an end to
this heart in the Sea Betwixt,
but I can in the Sea of the Living!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Gar, ye filthy woman!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
At last, I can fulfill my
duty as a guardian.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Bwaaa ha ha! Thanks a ton, lass!
Got me the egg without liftin' a finger!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Sigurd!? Ivar, please don't tell me you
brought him here from the Sea Betwixt!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Aye, my precious son brought me here as an
envoy of Deus Maris! Brought me back to
the Sea of the Living on his ship, so he did!
See, Baltasar? Fate be on my side!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: This is... This is terrible. The worst possible pirate has gotten his hands on the egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Hold a moment there, Pa. Weren't
ye wantin' a battle royale? I've no
intention of lettin' ye make a wish
to Deus Maris so easy.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Too bad, lad! Yer out of time!
The egg's gonna hatch in my arms!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Now, Deus Maris! Make me wish come
true! Give me the best life as a pirate:
treasure, feasts, grog, and women!
I be wantin' it all! Bwaaa ha ha!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Such a human wish. How dull.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Sigurd, you truly are the best pirate
to ever sail the open seas. How is it
that I did not realize it until now?
I give my all as a guardian unto you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Mmm?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Father, I beg ye to make me into the best
pirate there ever was! I'm proud as anything
to be yer son, and I hope ye can forgive me
for bein' so green in the piratin' ways.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: You too, Ivar?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Good! Good on both of ya! Now let all that
transpired between us be water under the
bridge, for Sigurd the pirate has a heart
broad as the Mare Nostrum herself!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
...Er, yer not bowin' to me.
I thought there'd be some bowin'.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
I am the king who rules the gloom.
Such darkness can never be yours.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
What have I done? How could I have
ever thought favorably of Sigurd?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Yar, I was never thinkin' I'd want
to be a pirate neither.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
You've been a great help, Captain,
but I must abandon this land.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Gar, and where do I go then, minnow?
Ye be the only man what can steer
this barnacle-blasted ship!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: The dark is ever with you. Farewell.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Yar, and there goes the minnow... Well, if it be Deus Maris's will that we fell
into the Sea Betwixt together, I suppose I can't
be arguin'. Perhaps he even be an envoy from
Deus Maris himself! What think ye, Azure?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
My wish didn't come true...
I have to start completely over...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Yar, what in all the waters
were ye wishin' for, lass!?

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Ghost1
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text:
Yar, I be so annoyed and bitter...
I'll never be forgivin' that woman!
Somebody fight me! I'll take ye all on!

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text: Yar, this be a pirate Azure killed.

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text:
Anger that persists with the spirit?
Fascinating. I shall calm it for her.

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Ghost1
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text:
Gar, I was meant to rule the Mare Nostrum!
If only I be havin' Deus Maris's egg!

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text:
She wished to rule, did she?
A very human thought.

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text:
Yar, I not be understandin'
pirates, for I be not one.

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ghost2
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
I have to give this back to...
But wait, where is...?
Where am I...?

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
You are in the Sea Betwixt.
Who are you looking for?

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ghost2
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
I... I can't remember the name. I've been
here so long that my memory is...lost.
But I think...they're at the harbor?

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ghost2
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
Please... Take this and give it to them...
I have no time left...

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
An axe? 'Tis a bit rusted, but...
Gar, hold on!

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
Aye, I see. If we get back to life,
let's be returnin' this to the owner.

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
So you know what to do. Very well.
We shall hold onto it until we are
returned to life.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
Well, well! If it isn't Ivar! I heard you sunk
to the bottom of the seas and left this world.
...Er, you're not a ghost or anything, right?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text: Nay, ye blind barnacle! I be alive!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
That's...that's my axe!
Where did you find it?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
I lent that axe to the man I loved—but when
he went off to hunt pirates, I never saw
him again. I'd thought this lost at sea...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text: Ye used to use that axe, lass?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
I had my own reckless youth,
thank you very much! But here. Take this new axe as
thanks for returning my own.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
I would give much to watch her
swing that weapon around.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
The less we think about this, the better.
In fact, let's just forget it ever happened.
Gar, and here I was thinkin' ghosts were
as spooky as things were gonna get today...

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
No one is here.
Neither human, nor spirit.

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
The ship itself still be havin'
powerful, unresolved feelings.

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text: And those feelings steer the ship?

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Yar, I see... The ship wants us
to find out where it be!

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
I'm impressed you understand its feelings.
Also, I imagine this to mean it is somewhere
in the Sea of the Living.

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
We will find you when we return to life.
I ask you to wait patiently until then.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
I sense the ship's feelings,
but see it not.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Gar, I see shipwrecked parts scattered all
over the place... Perhaps it merely be
wantin' to return to the sea?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
If we're meant to put it back together,
I will require your assistance.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Yar, a raft also be a ship.
Well done, minnow!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
It set sail alone, no souls aboard.
I suppose it truly was alive.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Aye, and I wager this ship be deeply
touched as well. Fine job indeed.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Mmm? A gift of thanks from the ship?
How amusing to see it imitating humans!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
What? Fine, I'll be doin' it.
Give it here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
She's a bit off-kilter, but it be fine,
for a raft also be a ship! Well done, me!

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ghost3
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
I pray someone might hear my song!
Listen and remember and pass it along!

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text: Ye want us to remember yer song?

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ghost3
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Exactly. Do you think you can remember
what I sing, then pass the message on? ...I'll take that as a yes. Right, then!
Settle down and listen to what I call
the Ballad of the Lighthouse!

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ghost3
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Way up atop the lighthouse
lived a science man!
He made a great big something
that he kept from all the land!

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ghost3
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
So we just tell the scientist:
you must join that green wire!
Just slap that thing together
and your skill we will admire! Doobie doobie do! She bop bop BAO!
Scat doobide dat and a la la la!
Ha cha cha cha!

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ghost3
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Hooo! Okay, I feel a lot better.
Thanks for listening, byeee!

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
And so the spirit found peace.
I suppose we should inform the
scientist at the lighthouse.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: scientist_Ghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Well? Get to it already!
I'm a very busy man.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Yar, it be somethin' about a wire,
but the color escapes me...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text: You must join the red wire.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text: You must join the blue wire.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text: You must join the green wire.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: scientist_Ghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Huh? Wait, is that all I needed to do!?
Excelsior! Just wait here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: scientist_Ghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Oh, bless you! I finally solved it
after so many years! And since that was my magnum opus,
you'd best enjoy it once you return
to life! Hee hee!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Well, I suppose he finally found peace.
I am quite eager to see his magnum opus.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: scientist_Ghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Huh? Wait, is that all I needed to do!?
Excelsior! Just wait here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: scientist_Ghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Tarnation! I failed miserably
and it's all YOUR fault! Eh, oh well. At this point, I'll just
enjoy myself here in the Sea Betwixt.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Was that joy I saw on his face?
He must truly enjoy living here, if so.

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunny_Architect
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
Please, someone save poor little me!
My fiancé was killed by fiends!
HEY! HEY! IT'S ME, PEDRO THE FIEND! GET OUTTA HERE, HUMANS!

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
Silence, you lowly fiend!
Your voice offends my ears!

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: ペドロ
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text: I'M A FIEND! A TERRIBLE FIEND! RUN AWAY! RUN, COWARDS!

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
If you will not be quiet willingly,
I can make it so you cannot
utter a single sound again.

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunny_Architect
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
Well, that's just sloppy! We can't
do our work if you act like that.

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
Avast, ye be the thieves! The ones trickin'
honest folk outta their belongings! Avast,
but that be worse than piratin', says I!

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
How much of a fool must one be
to be tricked by this thing?

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: ペドロ
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text: HELP! HELP! THIS MORON'S BULLYING ME! POOR ME! WON'T SOMEONE THINK OF PEDRO!?

SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: ペドロ
SUB_W04_GIMK_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text: WHOOPS! WHOOPS! JUST CLEARING MY THROAT! HERE! TAKE IT BACK! EVERYTHING I STOLE! OH, AND HERE'S SOME LOOT! NICE LOOT! FOUND IT ON THE GROUND AND EVERYTHING!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_00.text:
You are an enthralling individual who draws
chaos to you. Continue then to bring darkness
into this world, and know that even from afar,
the Dismal King watches over you always.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_01.text:
A world of darkness?
That sounds positively tantalizing!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_00.text:
You are an enthralling individual whose vessels
are true works of art. Sadly for you, I've no need
for ships in my journey, so I bade you to remain
here and refine your art.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_01.text: Of course! I will create the best ship ever for our honeymoon!

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_CUT_000_00.text:
You are an enthralling individual.
Know then that even from afar,
your soul will be with me always.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_CUT_000_01.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_CUT_000_01.text:
My power is for you...
All hail the Dismal King...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_030_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_030_CUT_000_00.text:
You are an enthralling individual.
Know then that even from afar,
your soul will be with me always.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_030_CUT_000_01.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_030_CUT_000_01.text:
O Dismal King...
At last I am free...

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_040_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_040_CUT_000_00.text:
You are an enthralling individual.
Know then that even from afar,
your soul will be with me always.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.text:
I'm no longer a hero, and as such can
remain with this band no longer.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.text:
Why is it that you so scrabble so
desperately for honor and faith?
What were you in the Mare Nostrum?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.text:
I was a pirate. I stole.
I ate. That was my life.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.text:
I vowed then and there to become a hero.
But to do that, I knew I had to find the
great treasure no one had ever claimed:
Deus Maris's egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.text:
After sneaking past the terrible guardians and
securing the egg, I made my wish to Deus Maris.
It came true: I was brought to Brighthome,
where I was given the name of Hero.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.text:
So you were the first pirate to have
his wish granted? Fascinating. But I would ask of you this:
What does honor mean to you?
Where is it that you find it?
In your friends? In justice?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.text:
Honor is sincerity. I stand not for profit or
logic, but merely the sincerity in my heart.
In doing so, I pay honor to the heavens.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.text:
Then what is faith?
An obligation? Intent?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.text: Faith is standing with those who have honor— standing for their honor instead of seeking profit or logic. You ask me what faith is? I say it is this: 'We seek not to be born on the same day, in the same month, in the same year. We merely hope to die on the same day, in the same month, in the same year.'

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.text:
It is all so clear-cut. But tell me, then, 
why you abandoned Brighthome? You could 
have remained a hero if you had but stayed,
for all you wished for was there. So why?

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.text:
Because our company took the step forward—
and it was my faith in all of us that led
me to take the step with you! I did this for my own honor, and not
for profit or logic—and it was you
who led us down that path, Count.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.text:
I have no interest in your honor or faith,
but your obsession with it brings about a
fantastical darkness. So continue walking
with us, Hero. Seek out your honor and faith.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.text:
And continue leading our band of warriors,
O Dismal King! For so long as honor and
faith walk with us, my loyalty is yours.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.text: Then you shall have the brand.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.text: Perhaps another time.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.text:
I welcome you into my thrall, Hero.
I now have you in my gaze at all times.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.text:
Your blood will become a part of me,
and will make me the Dismal King.
Together into eternity shall we live.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.text:
I appreciate the sentiment.
Let us leave it there for now.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: UI
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text: Siugnas's maximum LP was decreased by 1.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.text:
But one day, a minstrel came
from an outer ocean spinning
a tale of a true hero.

SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W04_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_CU.text:
'We seek not to be born on the same day,
in the same month, in the same year.
We merely hope to die on the same day,
in the same month, in the same year.' Upon hearing these words,
I wept for the first time in my life.
